description.lang: Mains powered static controller with binary switch capability, containing up to 1 power relay. Product uses same software as RXZ product, hardware platform changedProduct Name:RZ1 (Single Channel RF Relay Switching Unit)Brand Name:RZ1Product Line:Z-Wave productsProduct Code:087N610600Product Version:N/AProduct Comment:Mains powered static controller with binary switch capability, containing 1 power relay. Product - hardware platform changed & software ammendmentsBattery Type:Battery Count:Description:Radio Controlled Room Thermostat Reciever ModuleInclusion Note:Press left button (LED turns red), press and hold both buttons until the red led flashes, after a sucessful inclusion the button returns on red stateWakeup Note:
